short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save web pages to your self-hosted Filed Papers server with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Filed Papers Chrome Extension allows you to easily save and organize web pages to your self-hosted Filed Papers server. With a single click, you can bookmark any webpage and access it later through your personal Filed Papers dashboard.

Please note: This extension requires a self-hosted Filed Papers server. Visit https://github.com/svenkubiak/filedpapers for server setup instructions. 

Key Features:
• One-click bookmarking: Save any webpage instantly
• Self-hosted: Connect to your own Filed Papers server
• Secure authentication: Your data stays on your server
• Simple configuration: Easy setup with your server URL
• Privacy-focused: No third-party data collection

How It Works:
1. Configure your Filed Papers server URL in the extension options
2. Log in to your Filed Papers account
3. Click the extension icon to save any webpage
4. Access your bookmarks through your Filed Papers dashboard

Perfect for:
• Self-hosted enthusiasts
• Privacy-conscious users
• Digital content collectors
• Research and reference management
• Personal knowledge management

Requirements:
• A self-hosted Filed Papers server
• Google Chrome or compatible browser
• HTTPS connection to your server

This extension is open source and respects your privacy. All data is stored exclusively on your self-hosted server.
